p: The COVID-19 pandemic has shaken up the world and has affected almost every living person on this planet. SARS-CoV-2 is a new virus for which no vaccines, antibodies, or drugs are currently available. Although many potential vaccines and drugs are being investigated at a feverish pace globally, no breakthrough has been achieved. The use of serum from recovered patients, collected after their convalescence period, is considered to be a possible choice for the treatment of infected patients.
